GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
usb: roles: fix of node refcount leak in usb_role_switch_is_parent()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit c3767f81056bc2ccb41f0de49b0716d24167edd2, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 6fadd72943b80ff5bef175aacc2458c8a9ee3dbc. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: roles: fix of node refcount leak in usb_role_switch_is_parent()
